title: Development and Support Internship
points: Investigating and resolving issues reported by users or customers.
Creating and maintaining technical documentation, including user guides, API documentation, and internal knowledge bases.
Work on fixing bugs and addressing software defects.

title: Full Stak Developement
points: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products.
Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.

title: Mobile Developement
points: Implement pipelines and increase test coverages by testing its functionalities.
Contribute to enhancing the software by implementing new features and functionality.
Manage and work with UI/UX teams to design and implement payments solutions and dashboards.
Deploy environments and its envs in order to delivery white-label solutions.
